text: quick heads up, this page: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/menus-and-navigation#a-custom-built-menu-using-the-menu-function> contains a broken link to `example menu module built with the menu() function`
Also, is there a way to copy "Navigations" created in settings between staging and production sites. I forgot why I stayed away from these things originally....

Thank you for the note about the menu function example. Iâ€™ve updated the doc. The menu module in the boilerplate was renamed to simply be called menu.
<https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-theme-boilerplate/blob/main/src/modules/menu.module/module.html>
